long_description: The Easton EA70 Rear Road Wheel offers hand-built quality and performance for dependable all-around road use, whether training, commuting or riding long weekend club rides. Featuring a 17.5mm internal rim width; the extra-wide alloy rim creates more surface area for traction when leaning into corners. The Easton EA70 Rear Road Wheel is built with even, accurate spoke tension for outstanding durability. Easton V5 hub utilizes long-lasting sealed cartridge bearings. Alloy cassette body is compatible with Shimano 11-, 10- or 9-speed cassettes right out of the box.
short_description: The Easton EA70 Rear Road Wheel offers hand-built quality and performance for dependable all-around road use, whether training, commuting or riding long weekend club rides.
